argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-res | |- ( ( A X. B ) |` B ) = ( ( A X. B ) i^i ( B X. _V ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_inxp | |- ( ( A X. B ) i^i ( B X. _V ) ) = ( ( A i^i B ) X. ( B i^i _V ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_inv1 | |- ( B i^i _V ) = B |
| 4 | 3 | #P_xpeq2i | |- ( ( A i^i B ) X. ( B i^i _V ) ) = ( ( A i^i B ) X. B ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 4 | #P_3eqtri | |- ( ( A X. B ) |` B ) = ( ( A i^i B ) X. B ) |
| 6 |  | #P_inss2 | |- ( A i^i B ) C_ B |
| 7 |  | #P_xpss1 | |- ( ( A i^i B ) C_ B -> ( ( A i^i B ) X. B ) C_ ( B X. B ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( ( A i^i B ) X. B ) C_ ( B X. B ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_eqsstri | |- ( ( A X. B ) |` B ) C_ ( B X. B ) |
| 10 |  | #P_dfhe2 | |- ( ( A X. B ) hereditary B <-> ( ( A X. B ) |` B ) C_ ( B X. B ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_mpbir | |- ( A X. B ) hereditary B |
